name: VibeStream
description: Social web app for authentic community, moderated content, and real-time interaction.

current_prd.elevator_pitch: VibeStream is a social web app designed to cultivate authentic community interactions and provide higher quality, moderated content. Unlike existing platforms, VibeStream focuses on fostering genuine connections and a positive user experience, ensuring users find a more engaging and trustworthy online environment.
current_prd.problem_statement: Users on existing social media platforms often struggle with inauthentic interactions, overwhelming amounts of low-quality or unmoderated content, and a lack of genuine community, leading to disengagement and negative experiences.
current_prd.solution: VibeStream will provide a social web app with robust user authentication and profile management. It will feature a user feed supporting text and image posts, real-time liking and commenting, and a customized timeline based on user follows. Content moderation and user management will be handled via an admin dashboard, fostering an authentic and high-quality community experience.

key_features.feature_description: Allows users to sign up and log in using email/password or social authentication (e.g., Google, Facebook).
Enables users to create and manage their profiles, including bio, avatar, and account settings.
Displays a feed of posts from followed users and allows users to create new posts with text and images.
Allows users to like and comment on posts in real-time without page reloads, and provides infinite scroll functionality for the user feed.
Enables users to follow and unfollow other users, customizing their timeline.
Provides an administrative interface to moderate content, manage user accounts, and view platform analytics.
Ensures the platform can handle a growing number of users and data without performance degradation.
Implements measures to protect user data and ensure secure interactions.
Tracks user activity, system performance, and error logs for operational insights.
Tools and processes for deploying, maintaining, and supporting the application.
Allows users to share temporary content ('stories') that automatically deletes after 6 hours.
Enables users to share posts directly to other social media platforms and to export a direct sharing link for posts.
Implements in-app advertising and offers subscription plans for premium features to ensure financial sustainability.

User updates bio, uploads a new avatar, or modifies settings.
User clicks 'Save Changes'.
System updates user profile in the database.
User sees updated profile information.
User is on their feed or profile page.
User clicks 'Create New Post' button.
A modal or new page appears for post creation.
User enters text and/or uploads an image.
User clicks 'Post'.
System validates content, stores it, and publishes it to the user's feed and followers' timelines.
Post appears in the user's feed and is visible to followers.
User views a post in their feed.
User clicks the 'Like' icon.
System instantly updates the like count on the UI without page reload.
System records the like in the database.
If the user unlikes, the process reverses.
User views a post in their feed.
User clicks the 'Comment' icon or text field.
User types their comment.
User presses 'Enter' or clicks 'Submit'.

Admin logs into the Admin Dashboard.

Admin reviews reported posts or filters for specific content.
Admin selects a post and chooses to 'Approve', 'Hide', or 'Delete'.
System updates the post's status and notifies the original poster if necessary.
Admin can also view content history and user moderation actions.
Admin logs into the Admin Dashboard.
Admin navigates to the 'User Management' section.
Admin searches for a specific user or browses the user list.
Admin selects a user and can view their profile, posts, and activity.
Admin can 'Deactivate', 'Ban', or 'Edit User Role'.
System updates user status and applies chosen actions.
Admin logs into the Admin Dashboard.
Admin navigates to the 'Analytics' section.
Admin views dashboards displaying key metrics like active users, new signups, popular posts, and content engagement.
Admin can filter data by time range or other parameters.
System provides real-time or near real-time data visualizations.
User navigates to the story creation interface.
User captures or selects media (photo/video) for their story.
User adds optional text or stickers to the story.
User publishes the story.

current_prd.success_metrics: Reach 5,000 daily active users within the first six months. Average 5 likes/comments per post within the first six months.
current_prd.vision: To become the leading social web app for users seeking genuine connections and a curated, positive online experience, free from the noise and negativity prevalent on other platforms.

phasing.rationale: This phase delivers the fundamental social networking experience, allowing users to sign up, create profiles, post content, see a personalized feed, interact with posts, and follow others. It includes foundational security and operational features, making it a strong demo-able product and a viable MVP for early users.

These features provide essential tools for platform administrators to moderate content, manage user accounts, and gain insights into platform performance. This phase is crucial for internal operations and can be demoed to stakeholders to demonstrate control and data visibility before a wider public launch.

This phase introduces popular social features like temporary stories and external sharing capabilities, significantly enhancing user engagement and content reach. Including scalability here ensures the platform can handle a growing user base effectively as it moves towards a broader launch, making it suitable for a beta launch to a larger audience.

This phase focuses on implementing the business model, introducing in-app advertising and subscription plans for premium features. This is typically done after the core product has achieved some user traction and stability, ensuring long-term financial sustainability.

current_prd.design_principles:
User-Centric Design: Prioritize ease of use, intuitive interactions, and a personalized experience on VibeStream.
Authenticity & Community Focus: Design VibeStream to foster genuine connections and meaningful interactions, promoting a positive and supportive community environment.
Content Quality & Moderation: Implement design elements and features that support the curation and moderation of high-quality content, ensuring a safe and engaging environment.
Real-time Responsiveness: Ensure immediate feedback for user actions like posting, liking, and commenting on VibeStream.
Visual Clarity & Aesthetics: Employ a clean, modern, and engaging visual design that enhances content consumption on VibeStream.
Accessibility: Design VibeStream for all users, ensuring content and features are accessible to individuals with diverse abilities.
Consistency: Maintain a unified design language across all VibeStream platform elements for a cohesive user experience.
Performance: Optimize VibeStream for speed and efficiency, providing a smooth and uninterrupted user experience, especially with infinite scroll.
Security & Privacy: Implement robust design patterns that protect user data and privacy on VibeStream, building trust and confidence.
Feedback & Guidance: Provide clear and immediate feedback for user actions and guide users through complex tasks.

current_prd.navigation_design:
Global Navigation: A persistent top navigation bar will provide quick access to the main sections: Home (Feed), Explore/Discover, Notifications, and a Profile icon/avatar. This bar will remain visible during infinite scroll on the feed.
Create Post: A prominent, easily accessible button (e.g., a floating action button on mobile, or a dedicated button in the top bar on desktop) will allow users to quickly create new posts.
User Profile Navigation: Within a user's profile, tabs or sub-navigation links will allow users to switch between their posts, followers, and following lists.
Settings Navigation: A clear list of categories (Account, Privacy, Notifications) will be presented on the settings page for easy access to specific configurations.
Admin Dashboard Navigation: A dedicated sidebar navigation within the Admin Dashboard will provide access to Content Moderation, User Management, and Analytics sections.
Login/Signup Flow: A guided, multi-step form or distinct pages for user registration and login, separate from the main app navigation.

current_prd.tam_description: Total Addressable Market for the Global Social Media Industry, encompassing all platforms for online connection and content sharing, primarily driven by advertising revenue and user engagement.
current_prd.tam_estimation_basis: Based on global social media market size reports, considering total advertising spend and user base across all social platforms.
current_prd.tam_source: Statista Global Social Media Market Report, eMarketer Digital Ad Spending Forecasts, Grand View Research Social Media Market Analysis
current_prd.sam_description: Serviceable Available Market for dynamic, real-time, and well-moderated social platforms, targeting users (Social Connectors and Content Creators) who are dissatisfied with existing solutions due to outdated interfaces, lack of real-time interaction, and insufficient content moderation, seeking enhanced connection and content sharing.
current_prd.sam_estimation_basis: Estimated 15 percent of the TAM, representing the segment of social media users actively seeking alternative, more engaging, and better-moderated platforms, aligning with the identified problem statement and target audience needs.
current_prd.sam_source: User sentiment reports on social media dissatisfaction, growth trends of niche and alternative social platforms, market research on user migration.
current_prd.som_description: Serviceable Obtainable Market, representing the realistic market share the new social web app can capture within the SAM over a 5-year horizon, considering the highly competitive landscape and the platform's unique value proposition.
current_prd.som_estimation_basis: Conservative 1 percent market share estimate of the SAM over 5 years, acknowledging the dominance of established players but factoring in the potential for a new platform with strong moderation and real-time features to attract a dedicated user base.
current_prd.som_source: New social platform adoption rates, competitive market share analysis of emerging platforms, industry benchmarks for new market entry success.
current_prd.pricing_model_basis: Advertising-based, with potential for future premium features or subscriptions.
current_prd.advantage_summary: Modern, intuitive UI, seamless real-time interactions, robust content moderation, commitment to user privacy and content quality, fostering a vibrant and secure online experience for Social Connectors and Content Creators.
